headline.main: Brazil’s Economic Crisis Forces Cuts to Paralympics in Rio
headline.print_headline: Brazil’s Economic Woes Force Paralympic Cuts

docs.snippet: The Paralympic Games, set to start Sept. 7, are in a precarious financial position, with budget cuts affecting the number of workers, transportation options and sports venues....
docs.abstract: International Paralympic Games, set to start in Rio de Janeiro on Sept 7, face significant budget cuts due to low ticket sales and sponsorships; cuts will affect workers, transportation and venues, but not number of scheduled events.

byline.contributor: Ben Shpigel contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By REBECCA R. RUIZ and JERÉ LONGMAN

docs.lead_paragraph: The Paralympic Games, set to start Sept. 7, are in a precarious financial position, with budget cuts affecting the number of workers, transportation options and sports venues.

headline.main: Natalie Portman Tells 'A Tale of Love and Darkness'
headline.print_headline: Natalie Portman Tells 'A Tale of Love and Darkness'

docs.snippet: "It's like, I guess you caught me! I'm a nerd!" Natalie Portman says, laughing....
docs.lead_paragraph: "It's like, I guess you caught me! I'm a nerd!" Natalie Portman says, laughing.

headline.main: Coast Guard Recruit Who Died in Training Is an Honorary Grad
headline.print_headline: Coast Guard Recruit Who Died in Training Is an Honorary Grad

docs.snippet: A Coast Guard recruit from Virginia who collapsed and died after a physical fitness run at a New Jersey training center has been made an honorary graduate....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Coast Guard recruit from Virginia who collapsed and died after a physical fitness run at a New Jersey training center has been made an honorary graduate.

headline.main: Marathon Texas Refinery Employee Overcome by Fumes, Hospitalized
headline.print_headline: Marathon Texas Refinery Employee Overcome by Fumes, Hospitalized

docs.snippet: An employee of Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City, Texas was taken to a hospital in Galveston, Texas on Friday for exposure to chemical fumes, a company spokesman said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An employee of Marathon Petroleum Corp's Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City, Texas was taken to a hospital in Galveston, Texas on Friday for exposure to chemical fumes, a company spokesman said.

headline.main: New York Regulators: Taiwan Bank Must Pay $180M Penalty
headline.print_headline: New York Regulators: Taiwan Bank Must Pay $180M Penalty

docs.snippet: New York financial regulators say Mega International Commercial Bank of Taiwan will pay a $180 million penalty and install an independent monitor for violating the state's laws against money laundering....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York financial regulators say Mega International Commercial Bank of Taiwan will pay a $180 million penalty and install an independent monitor for violating the state's laws against money laundering.

headline.main: Baseball: League Clears Howard, Zimmerman of Doping Wrongdoing
headline.print_headline: Baseball: League Clears Howard, Zimmerman of Doping Wrongdoing

docs.snippet: Philadelphia Phillies first baseman Ryan Howard and Washington Nationals first baseman Ryan Zimmerman were cleared of wrongdoing in Major League Baseball's investigation into their possible use of performance-enhancing drugs, prompted by an Al Jaz...
docs.lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Phillies first baseman Ryan Howard and Washington Nationals first baseman Ryan Zimmerman were cleared of wrongdoing in Major League Baseball's investigation into their possible use of performance-enhancing drugs, prompted by an Al Jazeera report.

headline.main: World Record Buy Pogba Starts for Man Utd v Southampton
headline.print_headline: World Record Buy Pogba Starts for Man Utd v Southampton

docs.snippet: Paul Pogba, the world's most expensive player, will make his second debut for Manchester United against Southampton on Friday after being named by coach Jose Mourinho....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paul Pogba, the world's most expensive player, will make his second debut for Manchester United against Southampton on Friday after being named by coach Jose Mourinho.

headline.main: Exclusive-U.S. Withdraws Staff From Saudi Arabia Dedicated to Yemen Planning
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-U.S. Withdraws Staff From Saudi Arabia Dedicated to Yemen Planning

docs.snippet: The U.S. military has withdrawn from Saudi Arabia its personnel who were coordinating with the Saudi-led air campaign in Yemen, and sharply reduced the number of staff elsewhere who were assisting in that planning, U.S. officials told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. military has withdrawn from Saudi Arabia its personnel who were coordinating with the Saudi-led air campaign in Yemen, and sharply reduced the number of staff elsewhere who were assisting in that planning, U.S. officials told Reuters.

headline.main: Canada Wins Women's Soccer Bronze With 2-1 Win Over Brazil
headline.print_headline: Canada Wins Women's Soccer Bronze With 2-1 Win Over Brazil

docs.snippet: Christine Sinclair had struggled recently with the death of her father. So when she was given her bronze medal at the Olympics on Friday, the Canadian star immediately thought of him....
docs.lead_paragraph: Christine Sinclair had struggled recently with the death of her father. So when she was given her bronze medal at the Olympics on Friday, the Canadian star immediately thought of him.
